data.event: Avondale, incorporated in 1946, experienced rapid residential and commercial growth in the years since 1980.

event.title: opened a satellite facility (the Southwest Valley Urgent Care Center), at the corner of Avondale Boulevard and McDowell Road in the spring of 2013

data.event: Phoenix Children's Hospital opened a satellite facility (the Southwest Valley Urgent Care Center), at the corner of Avondale Boulevard and McDowell Road in the spring of 2013.
